title: ollama/ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: langchain-ai/langchain
summary: LangChain integrations for Ollama models via langchain-community.llms.Ollama.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, push models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama; works in Node & browsers.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface, model manager, RAG).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented-generation template using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into inline coding copilots.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Flutter desktop client for chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama-tools
summary: Experimental repo showing how to expose Python functions as tools to Ollama models.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that streams Ollama answers into any channel.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI pipelines that spin up Ollama containers and run model tests.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim wrapper around Ollama’s REST API with async/await and streams.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced CLI wrapper with prompt templates, history, and output formatting.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams query local Ollama models from Slack threads.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit component for chatting with Ollama models inside data apps.

title: ollama-dotnet
summary: .NET library and Source-generator for strongly-typed Ollama clients.

title: ollama-rustic
summary: Lightweight Rust crate published on crates.io for Ollama chat & embed endpoints.
